backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, contact submissions with rate limiting, admin-restricted queries, and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of high-level summaries for all frontend source files, describing each component’s purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, themes, and global styles for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining basic metadata, root mount element, and module script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring together all sections, updating SEO meta tags, and passing config-driven props.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing branding, quick links with smooth scrolling or external navigation, and a credits bar.
frontend/src/components/sections/Arduino: Displays Arduino code with metadata badges and allows users to copy the sketch using a copy-to-clipboard button.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form with validation, submission handling, and success/error states using custom hooks.
frontend/src/components/sections/DemoMed: Renders demo video and image gallery with error handling, or a placeholder when media is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/sections/Feature: Displays a grid of feature cards and an icon banner based on provided feature data.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background image, project title, tagline, and CTA buttons that handle scrolling or external links.
frontend/src/components/sections/ManualS: Renders a detailed user manual section with component lists and wiring instructions for the DHT11 project.
frontend/src/components/sections/Overvie: Displays a simple project overview section showing descriptive text passed as a prop.
frontend/src/components/sections/Practic: Renders a grid of real‑world application cards and a hysteresis warning note using icons and structured props.
frontend/src/components/sections/TechSta: Shows a list of tech stack items as badges in a styled section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Thresho: Provides an interactive temperature simulation with hysteresis logic that toggles a fan display.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with scroll-aware styling, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hook handling login, identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Updates a global backend client instance whenever the actor returned by useActor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Manages contact form submission state, success/error handling, and time‑based reset behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, base styles, and animation keyframes/classes.
frontend/src/lib/backendClient.ts: Caches and initializes a backend actor and exposes a function to submit contact form data with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/resolveAppUrl.ts: Resolves relative asset paths to full URLs using Vite’s BASE_URL, preserving absolute URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, loading global styles.
frontend/src/siteConfig.ts: Contains typed site configuration including project details, features, applications, notes, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, features, architecture notes, generated assets, and known issues.
